ISSUE.TITLE: Include a more modern Haskell image
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: How can someone submit a newer Haskell build? 7.4 is very outdated. A better target would be the 2013.2.0.0 Haskell Platform (https://index.docker.io/u/zsol/haskell-platform-2013.2.0.0/) which has upgraded to GHC 7.6.3. There's also a new Haskell Platform on its way which might even include GHC 7.8.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add search capability to repo and space listing (for child spaces) (#44) This change is adding search capability to the following apis: - child repositories - child spaces *NOTE* The search space is limited to direct child repos/spaces.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [MAINT] Add PAT CLI command and update readme (#45) Add PAT CLI command and update readme
